11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_ADAPTIVE_FIR_FILTER_ERL_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_ADAPTIVE_FIR_FILTER_ERL_H_
13
14#include <stddef.h>
15
16#include <array>
17#include <vector>
18
19#include "api/array_view.h"
20#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/aec3_common.h"
21#include "rtc_base/system/arch.h"
22
23namespace webrtc {
24namespace aec3 {
25
26// Computes and stores the echo return loss estimate of the filter, which is the
27// sum of the partition frequency responses.
28void ErlComputer(const std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>& H2,
29 rtc::ArrayView<float> erl);
30#if defined(WEBRTC_HAS_NEON)
31void ErlComputer_NEON(
32 const std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>& H2,
33 rtc::ArrayView<float> erl);
34#endif
35#if defined(WEBRTC_ARCH_X86_FAMILY)
36void ErlComputer_SSE2(
37 const std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>& H2,
38 rtc::ArrayView<float> erl);
39
40void ErlComputer_AVX2(
41 const std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>& H2,
42 rtc::ArrayView<float> erl);
43#endif
44
45} // namespace aec3
46
47// Computes the echo return loss based on a frequency response.
48void ComputeErl(const Aec3Optimization& optimization,
49 const std::vector<std::array<float, kFftLengthBy2Plus1>>& H2,
50 rtc::ArrayView<float> erl);
51
52} // namespace webrtc
53
54#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_ADAPTIVE_FIR_FILTER_ERL_H_
55
